data.name: Home.MetaDescription
data.value: Discover high-quality clothing and textiles. Shop men's and women's fashion with free shipping on orders over 200 PLN.

data.name: Product_SelectOptions
data.value: Select size and color to add to cart

data.name: Error_AddToCart
data.value: Failed to add product to cart

data.name: Footer_Brand_Description
data.value: Discover premium textile products that combine comfort, quality, and style. Your trusted source for fashion excellence.

data.name: FAQ_Subtitle
data.value: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

data.name: FAQ_NoResults_Text
data.value: Try different keywords or browse all categories

data.name: FAQ_NeedHelp_Text
data.value: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our customer support team is here to help.

data.name: FAQ_Q1_Answer
data.value: Kokomija is a premium online fashion retailer offering high-quality clothing and textiles for both men and women. We curate the latest trends and timeless classics to help you express your unique style.

data.name: FAQ_Q2_Answer
data.value: We are based in Poland and ship to customers across Europe. Our warehouse is located in Warsaw, ensuring fast and reliable delivery to your doorstep.

data.name: FAQ_Q3_Title
data.value: How do I place an order?

data.name: FAQ_Q3_Answer
data.value: Simply browse our products, select your desired size and color, and add items to your cart. When ready, proceed to checkout, enter your shipping information, and complete payment. You'll receive an order confirmation email immediately.

data.name: FAQ_Q4_Title
data.value: Can I modify or cancel my order?

data.name: FAQ_Q4_Answer
data.value: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it. After this time, orders are processed and shipped. Please contact our customer service immediately if you need to make changes.

data.name: FAQ_Q5_Answer
data.value: Yes! We offer elegant gift wrapping on all orders. Simply select the gift wrapping option during checkout and add a personalized message for the recipient. Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion.

data.name: FAQ_Q6_Answer
data.value: Standard shipping is 15 PLN for orders under 200 PLN. We offer FREE shipping on all orders over 200 PLN. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for 25 PLN.

data.name: FAQ_Q7_Answer
data.value: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days within Poland. For international orders, delivery typically takes 5-10 business days depending on your location. You'll receive tracking information once your order ships.

data.name: FAQ_Q8_Answer
data.value: Yes, we ship to most European countries. International shipping costs vary by destination. Additional customs fees may apply for non-EU countries and are the responsibility of the customer.

data.name: FAQ_Q9_Answer
data.value: Absolutely! Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also track your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

data.name: FAQ_Q10_Answer
data.value: We offer a 14-day return policy from the date of delivery, in accordance with Allegro standards. Items must be unworn, unwashed, with original tags attached. Returns are free for Polish customers. International return shipping costs are the customer's responsibility.

data.name: FAQ_Q11_Title
data.value: How do I initiate a return?

data.name: FAQ_Q11_Answer
data.value: Log into your account, go to "My Orders," select the order you want to return, and click "Request Return." Choose the items and reason, and we'll provide you with a return label and instructions.

data.name: FAQ_Q12_Title
data.value: When will I receive my refund?

data.name: FAQ_Q12_Answer
data.value: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect your returned items. The refund will be credited to your original payment method through Stripe's secure system. Bank processing times may vary by 2-3 additional business days.

data.name: FAQ_Q13_Answer
data.value: Yes! We offer free exchanges for different sizes or colors. Simply indicate "Exchange" when initiating your return, and specify your preferred replacement. We'll ship it as soon as we receive your original item.

data.name: FAQ_Q14_Title
data.value: What payment methods do you accept?

data.name: FAQ_Q14_Answer
data.value: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), digital wallets, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through Stripe, the world's leading payment platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

data.name: FAQ_Q15_Answer
data.value: 100% secure. All transactions are processed through Stripe with military-grade SSL encryption and PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance (the highest security standard). Your payment information is never stored on our servers â€“ Stripe handles everything securely. Our membership system is also fully powered by Stripe for maximum security.

data.name: FAQ_Q16_Answer
data.value: Our premium membership is managed entirely through Stripe, ensuring 100% secure recurring payments. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your membership at any time directly from your account dashboard. All billing is transparent with no hidden fees.

data.name: FAQ_Q17_Answer
data.value: Yes! Enter your discount code at checkout to apply it to your order. Codes cannot be combined with other promotions. Sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive discount codes and early access to sales.

data.name: FAQ_Q18_Title
data.value: Do I need an account to place an order?

data.name: FAQ_Q18_Answer
data.value: No, you can checkout as a guest. However, creating an account allows you to track orders, save multiple addresses, view order history, and receive exclusive member benefits and discounts.

data.name: FAQ_Q19_Title
data.value: How do I reset my password?

data.name: FAQ_Q19_Answer
data.value: Click "Login" at the top of the page, then select "Forgot Password?" Enter your email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. The link is valid for 24 hours.

data.name: FAQ_Q20_Title
data.value: How do I update my account information?

data.name: FAQ_Q20_Answer
data.value: Log into your account and go to "Account Settings." From there, you can update your email, password, shipping addresses, and communication preferences. Changes are saved automatically.

data.name: FAQ_Q21_Title
data.value: How can I contact customer service?

data.name: FAQ_Q21_Answer
data.value: You can reach us via email at support@kokomija.com, or use the contact form on our website. We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

data.name: FAQ_Q22_Title
data.value: How do I find the right size?

data.name: FAQ_Q22_Answer
data.value: Each product page includes a detailed size guide with measurements. We recommend measuring yourself and comparing to our size charts. If you're between sizes, we suggest ordering the larger size for comfort.
